title: Why is the client always so broken?
body:
Practice mode is still broken

Release of battle boss broke the client

Match history is now broken

Switching between menu's breaks the client

Loot can come up blank

Post game stats breaks when you switch between the tabs

Stats randomly take an age to load sometimes

---

Can you just rebuild this garbage from the ground up? it looks good but it works like trash

replies.body:
> Can you just rebuild this garbage from the ground up?

That would be another three years to exchange bugs for different bugs.
